attribute.furattributes.armor_shred.desc: Ignore armor on hit, by 0.66% each attribute value up to 33%
attribute.furattributes.bow_draw_speed.d: Modifies time of drawing ranged weapons. From -50% to 200%. Negative values increasing time of draw.
attribute.furattributes.buff_time.desc: Modifies time of buffs on player, negative amount decreasing duration of buffs on player
attribute.furattributes.cleave.desc: Attacks deal AoE damage, by 1% up to 100% from original damage based on attribute value.
attribute.furattributes.crit_chance.desc: Increase chance of critical hit up to 100%
attribute.furattributes.crit_damage.desc: Increase damage from critial hits, up to 500%
Decrease damage taken from crits, but damage cannot be less than x1.1 from original amount.
attribute.furattributes.damage_resistanc: Reduce damage taken, by 0.5% up to 50% based on attribute value
attribute.furattributes.debuff_time.desc: Modifies time of debuffs on player, negative amount increasing duration of debuffs on player
attribute.furattributes.duplex.desc: Increase chance to shoot additional arrow, up to 4 additional arrows based on attribute value.
attribute.furattributes.evasion.desc: Chance to dodge damage up to 66.6% with non-linear scale.
attribute.furattributes.global_damage.de: Increase any damage up to 10000%, calculates before Damage Reduction
attribute.furattributes.hunger_resistanc: Chance to not consume hunger up to 100%
attribute.furattributes.life_steal.desc: Heals by 1% from damage done, for every attribute value.
attribute.furattributes.loot_luck.desc: Chance to roll additional loot table drop, based on attribute value up to 100%.
attribute.furattributes.mana_leech.desc: Leeches mana from Iron's Spells or Ars Nouveau. Up to 100% of max mana.
attribute.furattributes.mining_speed.des: Modifies time of mining speed. From -100% to 200%. Negative values increasing time of mining.
attribute.furattributes.passive_regenera: Heals player by 1% up to 25% from max health each 2.5 seconds.
attribute.furattributes.runic_recharge_p: Increases amount of recovering Runic Shield.
attribute.furattributes.runic_recharge_r: Increases rate of recovering Runic Shield.
attribute.furattributes.runic_shield.des: Consumes incoming damage, slowly regen over time.
